TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WordTokenizeTransform extends Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.OneToOneTransformerBase
Public NotInheritable Class WordTokenizeTransform Inherits OneToOneTransformerBase

Docs.summary: This transform splits the text into words using the separator character(s).
Docs.remarks: The input for this transform is a ReadOnlyMemory or a vector of ReadOnlyMemory, and its output is a vector of ReadOnlyMemory, corresponding to the tokens in the input text. The output is generated by splitting the input text, using a set of user specified separator characters. Empty strings and strings containing only spaces are dropped. This transform is not typically used on its own, but it is one of the transforms composing the Text Featurizer.
